Literature.Title: Design and synthesis of cell selective ?/?-diastereomeric peptidomimetic with potent in vivo antibacterial activity against methicillin resistant S. Aureus.
Literature.Author: Dewangan RP, Bisht GS, Singh VP, Yar MS, Pasha S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:56% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:98.3±0.2% Killing=250 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 25668(MIC=2µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-44(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 7080(MIC=16µg/ml)
